title: 和设计师过稿
situation: You're reviewing a new checkout flow with your designer. They're showing the latest mockups.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 这是最新的设计稿，你看一下。
turns.pinyin: Zhè shì zuìxīn de shèjì gǎo, nǐ kàn yīxià.
turns.translation: Here's the latest design, take a look.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 整体不错，但我建议把表单步骤减少到三步。
turns.pinyin: Zhěngtǐ bùcuò, dàn wǒ jiànyì bǎ biǎodān bùzhòu jiǎnshǎo dào sān bù.
turns.translation: Overall it looks good, but I suggest reducing the form steps to three.
suggestions: 整体不错，但我建议把表单减少到三步。
我觉得可以，但步骤能不能少一点？

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 好的，我们改一版，明天发给你。
turns.pinyin: Hǎo de, wǒmen gǎi yī bǎn, míngtiān fā gěi nǐ.
turns.translation: Sure, we'll revise it and send it to you tomorrow.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 行，那我们週五再对一下。
turns.pinyin: Xíng, nà wǒmen zhōuwǔ zài duì yīxià.
turns.translation: Sounds good, let's sync again on Friday.
suggestions: 行，那我们週五再对一下。
好的，週五再约时间过一遍。
